name: Re-Jump
description:
Re-Jump
Re-jump's stand for Reverse Jump

Control
on pc use A, D / left, right
on mobile, just touch ur left or right side of screen (idk how to explain it, i'm sorry)

Description
Get ready for a unique twist on the classic infinite jumping game with Re-Jump! In this reverse game, you must navigate downward through an endless series of platforms, and avoiding obstacles along the way. With an addictive gameplay (i think), Re-Jump will challenge your reaction time and skill. So why wait? Play Re-Jump now and experience the thrill of infinite jumping in reverse!

Special Thanks
- To Joshuuu for the free music 
- To DrPetter's for the sfxr
